The claim originated from a Facebook pos: suggesting a direct link between wearing face masks and developing lung cancer.
The claim was found to be circulating on: including Facebook, Instagram, and various websites, indicating its widespread dissemination.
The claim referenced an article titled: Long-Term Mask Use May Contribute to Advanced Stage Lung Cancer, Study Finds," which was published on GlobalResearch.ca, a site previously fact-checked by AFP.
Multiple experts: including Dr. Leopoldo Segal, Dr. Nicole Ezer, and Dr. Gerard Cox, stated that there is no scientific evidence or rationale supporting the claim that wearing masks increases the risk of lung cancer.
